product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThe POREfessional Good Cleanup Foaming Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingThis gel face cleanser bubbles up into a refreshing, feel good foam for a pore-purifying cleanse. Pores look smaller and refined, and skin looks clearer over time. And with a cleanse this good, your skin will feel fresh and smooth, not tight or stripped.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly removes dirt, oil & impuritiesPores look & feel purifiedLightweight gel lathers into a bubbly foamClinically provenDermatologist-testedGentle, non-stripping & non-dryingNon-comedogenicRespects the skin's pHHelps reduce the appearance of breakoutsSuitable for all skin types, including sensitive skinPart of Benefit's Pore Care collection - a collection specially developed to help minimize, clear, and smooth the look of poresKey IngredientsLemon extract helps pores look smallerYuzu extract helps skin feel smootherBisabolol helps skin feel comfortableSphingolipids, ceramide-like molecules, help preserve initial skin hydrationFeaturesAFTER 1 USE, 97% said it visibly removes dirt, oil & impurities*AFTER 1 USE, 91% said it visibly purifies pores*AFTER 1 USE, 98% said skin is refreshed*AFTER 1 MONTH, 99% said skin looks clearer and feels smoother**AFTER 1 MONTH, 100% said skin looks radiant***Self-evaluation by 116 participants after 1 use**Self-evaluation by 116 participants after 1 monthItem 2606909How To UseTIPS & TRICKS: That good good clean...Apply to face & massage in gentle, circular motions. Rinse. Use daily AM & PM.Beauty Tip: Pair with The POREfessional Get Unblocked cleansing oil for a thorough double cleanse!IngredientsAqua (Water), Coco-Betaine, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Peg-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Maltitol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Parfum (Fragrance), Polyquaternium-22, Bisabolol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Sphingolipids, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Tocopherol, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: This made my face feel very oily and sticky

reviews.headline: Made My Face Red Itchy And Scaly
reviews.comments: I'm writing this for anybody that might have the same issue as me and doesn't know why. I started using this a month ago. I got a dry spot around my nose after about 2 weeks of use, didn't connect it was the cleanser because I changed some makeup and moisturizer as well. My skin started to get red and scaly all around my nose and mouth to the point I thought somehow I'd developed psoriasis or something. Then the red, itchy scaly skin started appearing around my eyes. I have been changing each part of my skincare routine one at a time trying to find the cause. Finally chucked this cleanser and within 3 days my skin is looking healthier but still a lot of damage to undo. DEFINITELY wouldn't recommend for anybody with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Been using for 3 years
reviews.comments: I have used it for 3 years and my pores are still so so clogged.. I continue to use it because it suds up nice and doesn't make me breakout but as far as cleaning pores out... I dont think it has

reviews.headline: It's a great product, does exactly what it says!
reviews.comments: 4 stars only because I'm a new user.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: I use this after the cleansing oil and my face always feels so soft and clean. Ive been using this for about 3 weeks and i havent experienced any irritation or breakouts. I have very sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: no never
reviews.comments: i got a mini sample of this from ulta and it sucks. i love everything else from benefit i've used but the texture of this ü§Æ. it's thinner than water. do not recommend.

reviews.headline: It's the only cleanser that makes me feel clean!
reviews.comments: Other cleansers make me feel greasy. Not this one. I love it and the price is right!

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It really helped tighten up my pores and I felt clean after use. You do have to take a hot shower for your pores to open otherwise it'll just sit there. Occasionally though I would feel a burning sensation but it's not that often to where it's concerning

reviews.headline: So far I'm loving it!!
reviews.comments: Washing my face with this product has left my face feeling so much better! I hated having my pores look so big when using makeup but this product leaves my face looking and feeling so great and my pore size has shrunk quite a bit!  Really loving it so far!

reviews.headline: Very drying cleanser
reviews.comments: Oddly, my cleanser doesn't bubble at all. After cleansing, my face feels dry like I used soap. The rest of my skincare routine made up for the dryness, thankfully. It diesn't feel healthy for your skin.

reviews.headline: it helped my skin so well
reviews.comments: it was very good

reviews.headline: Dry skin
reviews.comments: I can only use this as an exfoliator because I have dry skin but this has my skin purging so much and I love it!!!!

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: I have dry and very sensitive skin, this product said that it was sutable for those skin types, after the first time I used it i am not going to lie my skin did feel very refreshed, after i started using it daily around day 3 my skin become so dry it started cracking and bleeding on my face, mostly around my nose and mouth, i didnt even suspect that it was the face wash but i stopped doing my skin care altogether to let my face heal and if i did do my skin care it would burn my face so bad, after my skin healed which took about 3-4 weeks, i went back to doing my skincare which means i started using this face wash again, and after the 1st use my skin the next day was starting to peel again, and the day after that it was cracked and bleeding, they say this product does not strip you skin layer but I honestly think it does, so if you have sensitive dry skin like me i am telling you, stay away from this product.

reviews.headline: THE BEST & I'm picky about cleansers!
reviews.comments: My skin is super super sensitive and i struggle with trying new skincare because of that, especially with how expensive everything is these days. Ive been using this cleanser for almost a year now and it's the best thing that's ever touched my face. If you struggle with textrure or acne, this will make a significant difference. Whenever i get pimples and use this cleanser it reduces the size of them overnight. I always pair it with a spot treatment and a pimple patch to speed up the process. I never write reviews but this product deserved one. 10/10!!!

reviews.headline: Good cleanser
reviews.comments: It does what you need it to do, and it doesn't take a lot of product to get the job done. I wouldnt say I have the most sensitive skin but it can be quite picky about cleansers, and this one passes the test

reviews.headline: amazing.
reviews.comments: this cleared up my textured face so well, got rid of the bumps all over my forehead, lightweight and smelles amazing +super easy to use

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love!!!

reviews.headline: wow!!!
reviews.comments: i really like this product. its nice and gentle. ive been using it for a few weeks and have started to notice a difference in my skin. its so smooth, i hardly get any blemishes. i bought the mini but now i'm probably going to get the regular size. it works great!

reviews.headline: Best Cleanser
reviews.comments: Amazing cleanser. Definitely going to be a repurchase. Your skin feels so much cleaner after and you only really need the smallest dot. It's so fresh feeling. I love it and will recommend to anyone looking for a new cleanser.

reviews.headline: Best Cleanser
reviews.comments: Amazing cleanser. Definitely going to be a repurchase. Your skin feels so much cleaner after and you only really need the smallest dot. It's so fresh feeling. I love it and will recommend to anyone looking for a new cleanser.

So far it is gentle
media.caption: After completing my entire skin care routine (used multiple products from the Porefessional Skincare Range)

media.headline: Acne Prone Skin STAMP OF APPROVAL

faceoff_positive.comments: I would first off like to say that I have only used this product once, however with that being said, I truly believe this is by far one of the best cleansers I've ever used. If you pair this with the Get Unblocked oil makeup remover (if you wear makeup) and the deep retreat clay mask, your skin will thank you. My skin has never felt so soft from just washing it. The blackheads around my nose have diminished and my pores were definitely reduced. If blackheads or large pores are a concern for you, I'd definitely recommend this product. Honestly, I recommend this product even if you don't have those concerns. This is just a great cleanser overall. This is a very lightweight and gentle cleanser too and it gives you the amount you need when you pump it so you aren't over using product. Also, per the Benefit Cosmetics website, this is for all skin types (including sensitive). All in all, if you're looking to try a new cleanser out, I'd highly recommend trying this one.
faceoff_positive.headline: 100% yes

faceoff_negative.comments: I have dry and very sensitive skin, this product said that it was sutable for those skin types, after the first time I used it i am not going to lie my skin did feel very refreshed, after i started using it daily around day 3 my skin become so dry it started cracking and bleeding on my face, mostly around my nose and mouth, i didnt even suspect that it was the face wash but i stopped doing my skin care altogether to let my face heal and if i did do my skin care it would burn my face so bad, after my skin healed which took about 3-4 weeks, i went back to doing my skincare which means i started using this face wash again, and after the 1st use my skin the next day was starting to peel again, and the day after that it was cracked and bleeding, they say this product does not strip you skin layer but I honestly think it does, so if you have sensitive dry skin like me i am telling you, stay away from this product.
